requirements.title: Consent records for data processing
requirements.description: Maintain verifiable consent logs for all personal data collection and processing events.

requirements.title: Right-to-erasure workflow
requirements.description: Provide a documented and tested process to delete personal data within regulatory timelines.

requirements.title: Data Protection Impact Assessments
requirements.description: Run and store DPIAs for high-risk automated decisions.

requirements.title: Cross-border transfer safeguards
requirements.description: Enforce SCCs or equivalent transfer controls for data moved outside applicable regions.

requirements.title: Access control policy
requirements.description: Role-based access controls are implemented and reviewed quarterly.

requirements.title: Change management evidence
requirements.description: Track approvals and rollback plans for production changes.

requirements.title: Continuous monitoring
requirements.description: Security and availability alerts are monitored with documented response SLAs.

requirements.title: Vendor risk assessments
requirements.description: Perform annual due diligence and contractual controls for critical vendors.

requirements.title: PHI environment segmentation
requirements.description: Isolate PHI workloads and enforce strict network boundaries.

requirements.title: Business Associate Agreements
requirements.description: All relevant vendors have signed BAAs with current terms.

requirements.title: PHI audit trail integrity
requirements.description: Create immutable access logs for PHI retrieval and modification.

requirements.title: Breach notification readiness
requirements.description: Document and test incident response workflows for PHI breaches.

requirements.title: Risk register maintenance
requirements.description: Maintain and review ISMS risk register with treatment plans.

requirements.title: Statement of Applicability
requirements.description: Keep SoA updated with control rationale and implementation status.

requirements.title: Security awareness training
requirements.description: Conduct annual security training and track completion evidence.

requirements.title: Business continuity testing
requirements.description: Run and document continuity and disaster recovery tabletop exercises.

requirements.title: Notice at collection
requirements.description: Provide consumers with clear notice about categories of data collected.

requirements.title: Do Not Sell/Share controls
requirements.description: Offer and honor opt-out controls for sale or sharing of personal information.

requirements.title: Consumer request SLA
requirements.description: Fulfill access and deletion requests within statutory response windows.

requirements.title: Data inventory and mapping
requirements.description: Maintain current inventory of personal information use and retention.
